examples: he heard the crunch of footsteps on the gravel path

definitions.text: a critical situation that arises because of a shortage (as a shortage of time or money or resources)

examples: his shoes were crunching on the gravel

definitions.text: press or grind with a crushing noise

examples: The children crunched the celery sticks

definitions.text: reduce to small pieces or particles by pounding or abrading
examples: grind the spices in a mortar
